sentence: Everything about this movie is stupid.
explanation: The user's negative sentiment towards the movie is evident, as they strongly express their dislike using the word "stupid," indicating a confident and highly negative opinion.

sentence: Even if you love bad movies, do not watch this movie.
explanation: The summary explanation is that the sentiment towards the movie is strongly negative as the person advises against watching it, even for those who enjoy bad movies.

sentence: It is shameful.
explanation: The sentiment expressed in the explanations is consistently negative, with the word "shameful" indicating strong disapproval and moral wrongness. Thus, the overall sentiment can be summarized as highly negative.

sentence: I would give this television series a 10 plus if i could.
explanation: The majority of explanations expressed a highly positive sentiment towards the television series, with a strong desire to rate it very highly, even beyond a rating of 10.

sentence: The writers were "smack on" and I think the best actors and actresses were a bonus to the show.These characters were so real.
explanation: The user's feedback indicates a highly positive sentiment towards the show, praising the writers, actors, and actresses for their excellent work, realistic portrayal of characters, and exceeding expectations.

sentence: I must say I have taped most of the episodes and i find myself watching them over and over again.
explanation: The user's statement reveals a strong positive sentiment and deep enjoyment in repeatedly watching the episodes, indicating high satisfaction with the show.

sentence: Now you know why I gave it a 10+!
explanation: The statement is overwhelmingly positive, with strong emphasis on the highly positive rating indicated by "10+" and the use of enthusiastic language.

sentence: I don't know exactly what it is about this movie, but we latched on to this endearing movie and it has become a special part of our family's memories.
explanation: The sentiment of the text is consistently positive, with the user expressing fondness and a strong emotional connection to the movie, describing it as endearing and special in their family's memories.

sentence: I totally and absolutely recommend this movie to anyone who likes good wholesome family movies because that is exactly what this is.
explanation: The explanations all convey a highly positive sentiment towards the movie, emphasizing its qualities as a good wholesome family film and a strong recommendation for anyone who enjoys such movies.

sentence: The things that the four kids get themselves into is absolutely hilarious to watch.
explanation: The explanations consistently convey a positive sentiment towards the four kids' actions, finding them funny, entertaining, and amusing to watch.

sentence: This is one of the best movies out there that shows such strong sibling bond for each other.
explanation: The text expresses a highly positive sentiment towards the movie, praising its portrayal of a strong sibling bond and rating it as one of the best.

sentence: Much more interesting, more action, more suspense, and less of the unneeded controversy.
explanation: The statement reflects a strong positive sentiment towards the subject, emphasizing its interesting and action-packed nature, as well as a preference for less controversy and more enjoyment.

sentence: Everything from acting to cinematography was solid.
explanation: The overall sentiment of the statements is positive, with praise for the acting and cinematography being of high quality.

sentence: Definitely worth checking out.
explanation: The explanations all indicate that the statement "Definitely worth checking out" has a positive sentiment, conveying enthusiasm and a strong recommendation to explore something of value or quality.

sentence: Damian is so talented and versatile in so many ways of writing and portraying different Characters on screen.
explanation: The explanations all emphasize the highly positive sentiment towards Damian, praising his talent, versatility, and ability to portray different characters on screen.

sentence: This movie has a cutting edge to it.
explanation: The user's sentiment towards the movie is positive, as they believe it to be innovative and ahead of its time.

sentence: I am so pleased to know such a modern day genius is out there , letting is passion for Art drive him and taking us as an audience with him.
explanation: The explanations highlight a highly positive sentiment towards the individual's artistic abilities, with strong admiration and appreciation for their dedication, enthusiasm, and positive impact on the audience.

sentence: The new characters weren't all that memorable, and I found myself forgetting who was who.
explanation: The overall sentiment is slightly negative, with a common theme being that the new characters in the statement were forgettable and lacked impact.

sentence: I felt as though her going to Ireland did absolutely nothing whatsoever.
explanation: The overall sentiment expressed in the explanations is negative, portraying disappointment or frustration with no perceived impact or importance of the person going to Ireland.

sentence: It didn't make me scared, horrified, or make me sympathetic towards the characters; it was simply annoying.
explanation: The explanations indicate that the text expresses a negative sentiment and that the user found it annoying, lacking enjoyment or connection with the content.

sentence: The jerky camera movements were also annoying.
explanation: The explanations all indicate a negative sentiment towards the jerky camera movements, suggesting that viewers find them annoying and that there may be other negative aspects as well.

sentence: The plot was the same as pretty much every other cheap horror.
explanation: The explanations generally convey a negative sentiment towards the movie's plot, specifically highlighting its similarity to other low-quality and repetitive horror films. The reasoning provided justifies the negative sentiment and reflects the sentiment score accurately.

sentence: There was a few pathetic attempts to give the characters some depth, but it didn't really work into the rest of the plot.
explanation: The explanations collectively highlight a negative sentiment towards the lack of depth and integration of characters with the plot, leading to disappointment and dissatisfaction.

sentence: I guess it was supposed to be clever twist, then shed some light on the situation, but it was just stupid.
explanation: The sentence expresses a slightly negative sentiment towards a supposed twist that is perceived as stupid and fails to provide clarity or enlightenment.

sentence: If you see it, you should probably just leave it on the shelf.
